title: Starry sky
description: Code your own starry night sky using the random function!

steps.hint: And set la couleur de dessin to yellow
Now let's open a loop - **tape** `for i in [ 0 .. 32 ]`
Now to set where each star will go -  **tape** `moveTo (random 1, 500), (random 1, 500)`
Finally draw each star as un cercle de taille 5

completion_text: Awesome! Press space and see what happens to the stars...
